title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Advanced CPR Practitioner Online Training

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Within six months, over 90% of learners can accurately demonstrate adult CPR skills compliant with ILCOR (International Liaison Committee on Resuscitation) 2025 guidelines.
Learners can make rapid situational judgments and initiate 119 emergency reporting procedures within 10 seconds of cardiac arrest.
Within three months post-training, over 80% of learners report confidence in applying CPR in real emergency scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
